```{r, include = FALSE}
library(mosaic)
options(digits = 6)
library(Stat2Data)
library(readr)
library(ggformula)
library(dplyr)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(stringr)
library(GGally)
```


```{r}
SLD <- read_csv("SLD.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

#CA data
SLD.CA <- SLD %>% filter (endsWith(CBSA_Name, "CA"))
SLD.CA <- na.omit(SLD.CA)

#SF data
SLD.SF <- SLD %>% filter (str_detect(CBSA_Name, "San Francisco"))



```


#### mutation/transformation ideas
```{r}
#New Var Transformations

SLD.CA <- mutate(SLD.CA, sqrtD5BE = (D5BE)^0.5)
SLD.CA <- mutate(SLD.CA, cubeP_WrkAge = (P_WrkAge)^1/3)
SLD.CA <- mutate(SLD.CA, sqrtD3BPO3 = sqrt(D3BPO3))

#Variable Density Plots
gf_density(~sqrtD5BE, data = SLD.CA)
gf_density(~Pct_AO2p, data = SLD.CA)
gf_density(~cubeP_WrkAge, data = SLD.CA)
gf_density(~D5CRI, data = SLD.CA)
gf_density(~sqrtD3BPO3, data = SLD.CA)

#
gf_density(~NatWalkInd, data = SLD.CA)


names(SLD.CA)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
ggpairs(SLD.CA[c("NatWalkInd", "cubeP_WrkAge", "D5CRI", "sqrtD5BE", "sqrtD3BPO3")], 
        title = "GGPairs of NatWalkability Index against cubeP_WrkAge and D5CRI")
      
      
ggpairs(SLD.CA.update[c("NatWalkInd", "Pct_AO2p")], 
        title = "GGPairs of NatWalkability Index against Pct_AO2p")

mod = lm(NatWalkInd ~ cubeP_WrkAge + D5CRI + sqrtD5BE + sqrtD3BPO3 + Pct_AO2p  ,data = SLD.CA)

msummary(mod)
```
